Work

6 FeetAway Gaming

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery, bootstrap

The 6FeetAway Gaming application allows users to find regional based COVID statistics and find free-to-play games, while on quarantine. The user can select a state to recieve relevant COVID stats and select a genre to cycle through various games. On the bottom users can cycle through a carousel of games available on the free to play games API. Finally, the application provides links to CDC resources regarding quarantine guidelines.

View Project on GitHub

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery, bootstrap

Welcome to my Weather Dashboard. This application is built using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap for styling, jQuery, and the Open Weather One API for data. Users can input a city in the text box and search for current weather data and a five-day forcast!

View Project on GitHub

Workday Schedule

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Welcome to my Workday-schedule. Here you can plan out your day by building a personal schedule, tracking your regular business hours 9am-5pm. Input your task in the textfield and click the save button to have the task saved on refresh and window close. Hours are tracked by color, where each color denotes whether the time has passed, is in the future, or if it is the current hour; colored grey, green, and red respectively.

View Project on GitHub

Coding Quiz

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS

Test your coding knowledge and compare your skills against your friends (on the same device and broswer)!
